title: Decline of open-range cattle ranching - cause

content.question: All of the following contributed to the decline of open-range cattle ranching at the end of the nineteenth century EXCEPT

choices.label: federal recognition of American Indian land claims
a drop in cattle prices at stockyards
production of crops for distant markets

content.answer: federal recognition of American Indian land claims

topic.text: 6.3: Westward Expansion - Social and Cultural Development

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
